definition[0]: when a professional person makes a mistake or does not do their job properly and can be punished by a court
example[0]: Her doctor was found guilty of malpractice.
definition[1]: when someone breaks the rules of their profession or breaks the law in order to gain some advantage for themselves
example[1]: He accused the attorneys of legal malpractice.
example[2]: Insider trading is one of the many malpractices that needs to be stopped.
